<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_110003</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_110003</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Structure of an antibody molecule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Struktur eines Antikörpermoleküls</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure d'une molécule d'anticorps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura de uma molécula do antibody</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura di una molecola dell'anticorpo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δομή ενός μορίου αντισωμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura de una molécula del anticuerpo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the structure of an antibody molecule. It is made up of four polypeptide chains that are held together by disulphide bridges. It also has two antigen binding sites which is different for different types of antibody molecule.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">antibody molecule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">antigen binding site</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">disulphide bridge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polypeptide chain</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Struktur eines 
Antikörpermoleküls. Sie besteht vier Polypeptidketten, die 
durch Disulfidbrücken zusammengehalten werden. Sie hat auch 
zwei verbindliche Sites des Antigens, die für unterschiedliche Typen 
des Antikörpermoleküls unterschiedlich ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la structure d'une 
molécule d'anticorps. Elle se compose de quatre chaînes de 
polypeptide qui sont liées par des ponts en bisulfure. Elle a 
également deux accepteurs d'antigène qui est différente pour 
différents types de molécule d'anticorps.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a estrutura de uma 
molécula do antibody. É composta de quatro correntes do 
polypeptide que são mantidas junto por pontes do bissulfeto. 
Tem também dois locais obrigatórios do antígeno que é 
diferente para tipos diferentes de molécula do antibody.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la struttura di una 
molecola dell'anticorpo. Si compone di quattro catene del 
polipeptide che sono tenute insieme dai ponticelli del bisolfuro. 
Egualmente ha due luoghi obbligatori dell'antigene che è 
differente per i tipi differenti di molecole dell'anticorpo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη δομή ενός μορίου 
αντισωμάτων. Αποτελείται από τέσσερις polypeptide 
αλυσίδες που διατηρούνται τη συνοχή από τις γέφυρες 
δισουλφιδίου. Έχει επίσης δύο περιοχές συσχετισμών 
αντιγόνων που είναι διαφορετικό για τους διαφορετικούς τύπους 
μορίων αντισωμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la estructura de una 
molécula del anticuerpo. Se compone de cuatro encadenamientos 
del polipéptido que sean ligados por los puentes del disulfuro. 
También tiene dos sitios obligatorios del antígeno que es 
diferente para diversos tipos de molécula del anticuerpo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Antikörpermolekül</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">verbindliche Site des Antigens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Disulfidbrücke</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Polypeptidkette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">molécule d'anticorps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">accepteur d'antigène</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pont en bisulfure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chaîne de polypeptide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">molécula do antibody</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">local obrigatório do antígeno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ponte do bissulfeto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">corrente do polypeptide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">molecola dell'anticorpo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">luogo obbligatorio dell'antigene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ponticello del bisolfuro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">catena del polipeptide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μόριο αντισωμάτων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιοχή συσχετισμών αντιγόνων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γέφυρα δισουλφιδίου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">polypeptide αλυσίδα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">molécula del anticuerpo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sitio obligatorio del antígeno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">puente del disulfuro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">encadenamiento del polipéptido</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
